rows.label: qst202830_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Menou, is there
anything you want us to do?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0002
rows.name: Rex, what's this all of a sudden?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0003
rows.name:
Menou, you're always the
one organizing things and
taking care of us, right?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0004
rows.name:
So, I want to do
something to repay you.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0005
rows.name:
Me too! I want to give
something back to Menou.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmm...[ML:Dash ] Even if you say that, I
can't really think of anything...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202830_msg0007
rows.name:
It can be something small,
anything at all, just say it.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0008
rows.name:
That's right, mo! It doesn't
cost anything to say it, mo!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0009
rows.name: Well, in that case...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202830_msg0010
rows.name: I guess I'd like to find a rare ore.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0011
rows.name: A rare ore, mo?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0012
rows.name: I enjoy collecting stones as a hobby.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0013
rows.name: Did you know?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0014
rows.name:
When you find a new kind of
ore, the discoverer gets to
give it any name they like.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0015
rows.name:
So I'd like to find a new kind
of ore and give it a name.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0016
rows.name:
Wow. That sounds like
a wonderful dream.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0017
rows.name:
But isn't finding a new kind
of ore pretty difficult?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0018
rows.name:
Of course. I know it's not something
that can be easily achieved.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0019
rows.name:
It's just a dream, an aspiration.
You don't have to worry about it.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0020
rows.name:
No, let's do it! Let's all
make Menou's dream come true!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0021
rows.name:
You can't achieve your dreams
if you give up from the start!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0022
rows.name:
Tora agrees with Boss, mo! Let's
search for ores together, mo!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0023
rows.name: Thank you, everyone!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0024
rows.name: But...[ML:Dash ] how do we find a rare ore, mo?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0025
rows.name:
Actually, there's a rumor that
you can easily find rare ores
in the Old Quarry in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0026
rows.name:
If everyone is okay with it,
could we go and take a look?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0027
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0028
rows.name: Let's set off right away, mo!
